title: Long Ride
description: Becca Waters is being stalked by the only client she was unable to successfully defend in court. That client has since been paroled and is looking for revenge for the years he spent imprisoned. Becca’s brother, in an effort to ensure her safety, has asked the one man she can’t seem to ignore to keep her safe. Richard Long. Richard Long, known as ‘Dickie’ to the group of bikers he works with has wanted Becca since the first time he laid eyes on her. He senses she is running from more than just a former client though and he intends to find out her secrets one way or another. Seducing the fiery attorney may prove to be the longest ride of his life.
author: Rebecca M. Avery
